title: Loot is Gone!
body: I logged on today and all my loot is gone. I've been on league for about 3 years now and this has never happened. Everything that I have accumulated since Loot has started is gone including my gems, essence, keys and chests along with all the skins and champion shards. What should I do? Please help.

replies.body: This happened to me just now. I had two champion shards that I was going to disenchant but they're gone now. I tried relogging in as Rezial did but that clearly didn't help.

I have also just ran across this problem, my essence and rumble champ shard are gone, or atleast i can't see them anymore. my chests aswell.... didnt even notice that one.  ( oh hey i relogged and its all back.. and i got the demacia icon....idk if it fixed itself or it was fixed)

I looked into your account to see if I could track down your missing hextech loot. Looking at your inventory, I do see plenty of gemstones and skin shards too, so this is curious....

Are you missing your loot on a different account? If you still don't see anything at all, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can go more in depth.
